name: 古瓊昇
objective:
本課程旨在培養學生物聯網智慧應用與實務技能，包含物聯網基礎、智慧應用、整合平台、工業物聯網、數據分析、數據圖示化等實用內容。同時，探討衛星物聯網的全球數據傳輸技術，包括物聯網基礎、通信原理、系統構建、傳感器技術、安全和應用案例。
This course aims to cultivate students' skills in practical applications of IoT, covering foundational concepts, smart applications, integration platforms, industrial IoT, data analysis, and data visualization. Additionally, it explores the global data transmission techniques of satellite IoT, encompassing fundamentals, communication principles, system construction, sensor technology, security, and application case studies.
